roleset.name: presenting signs of, indicating

role.descr: topic (symptoms are relevant to what, typically a body part)

example.name: both args
example.text: This latest decision is symptomatic of that resistance but economic events will ultimately decide whether " resistance is futile " .

example.name: symptomatic-j, ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Patient has been symptomatic for about 10 months with changes to her bowel habits .
example.amr: (s / symptomatic-01 :ARG0 (p / patient-yy) :ARG2 (c / change-01 :pl + :ARG1 (h / habit-01 :ARG1 p :ARG3 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "bowel") :part-of p))) :duration (a / about :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 10 :unit (m / month))))

example.name: symptom-n, ARG0 and ARG3
example.text: He has never had any gallbladder symptoms .
example.amr: (s / symptomatic-01 :polarity - :ARG0 (h / he) :ARG3 (a / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "gallbladder")) :time (e / ever) :mod (a2 / any))

example.name: symptomatology-n, ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: Patient began to exhibit current symptomatology of abdominal pain , gas , and bloating .
example.amr: (b / begin-01 :ARG0 (p3 / patient-yy) :ARG1 (e / exhibit-01 :ARG0 p3 :ARG1 (s2 / symptomatic-01 :ARG0 p3 :ARG2 (a / and :op1 (p / pain-01 :ARG1 p3 :ARG2 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "abdomen"))) :op2 (g / gas-04 :ARG1 p3) :op3 (b2 / bloat-01 :ARG1 p3)) :time (c / current))))

example.name: symptom-n, ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Patient underwent EGD for GERD symptoms .
example.amr: (e / egd-01 :ARG1 (p / patient-yy) :ARG1-of (c / cause-01 :ARG0 (s2 / symptomatic-01 :ARG0 p :ARG1 (d / disease-disorder :name (n / name :op1 "GERD")))))

roleset.note: SYMPTOM-N and SYMPTOMATOLOGY-N NOTES: Added by Kristin based on THYME data, as well as ARGs 2 and 3.
SYMPTOMATIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3, asymptomatic.01. (from symptomatic.01-j)
